Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory94.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "The trapped person... It's the kid I saw, the one with the picture frame!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'In the commotion, he ran off towards the playground over there.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanny', 3: 'That must be... the child the master wants me to find... I must protect him...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Take five here', 3: '12'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant', 3: 'Search for resources here. Once we are resupplied, continue the chase.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Lots of batteries here. Take a few as backups.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "They've got some mechanoids I haven't seen before... What a surprise...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wow! It's Dragoon Quest! I've never played this one before!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I... got a Froggie here...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Now there's a side of Lucia we don't often get to see. Oh, here's a snow globe.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanny', 3: 'If only the child could play with you all...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Can we switch on the power here so that we can better track down the main power source?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'There also seems to be more and more metal coils around us. Suspicious.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Already on it... It's probably from the sturdy metal insulation present in all the buildings in this district.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Route plotting suggests we have to pass through a playground to get to the main power source.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'If we can get the power flowing and activate the lighting systems, they will guide us to the playground.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia & Bianca', 3: "We found a map under a cashier's counter.", 4: '2', 5: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanny', 3: 'I remember... the way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No time to waste', 3: '63'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the lights brighten up the place one by one, the prosperous past of this place becomes increasingly visible. Yet the screeches of Constructs also follow...'}
